about_the_game:
Outfit for Maam (Warrior Priest) based on the Priest from Dragon Quest III: The Seeds of Salvation.

*Available individually or as part of the Digital Deluxe Edition.

content_descriptors.notes: Infinity Strash: DRAGON QUEST The Adventure of Dai contains fantasy violence, mild blood and mild language in certain areas of the game.

detailed_description:
Outfit for Maam (Warrior Priest) based on the Priest from Dragon Quest III: The Seeds of Salvation.
